Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells, and State due to, street blockage near Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells, and State due to, street blockage near Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #10 Museum of Science & Industry Temporary Reroute near Monroe
ShortDescription: Update:10 Museum of Science & Industry buses temp. rerouted SB: Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells and State; NB: State, Adams, Dearborn and Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#10 Museum of Science & Industry buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Monroe, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Adams, Dearborn and Wacker.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near 63rd
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near 63rd due to track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near 63rd due to track conditions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, such as #29 State or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
